name: underprivileged
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
without the money, possessions, education, opportunities, etc. that the average person has: Children from an underprivileged family background are statistically more likely to become involved in crime. Compare
privileged
the underprivileged
polite phrase for poor people: The charity raises money for holidays for the underprivileged.
Add to word list
Add to word list
lacking the money and the basic social advantages that most people have; poor: a summer camp for underprivileged children
